Plot: In a Athens,Achilles and Melina get drunk and fall in love.After they spend a night together,Melina leaves to get married,as well as Achilles.Even though they didn't know anything about each other,their paths will very soon cross again.
Title: Brousko
Actors: Apostolis Totsikas, Eleni Vaitsou, Varvara Larmou, George Zenios
